Description: A square red object, pinkish at the front.
One large black triangular aircraft with three bright lights in a triangle formation. There was a rumbling sound.
Strange light that was watched for one and a half hours.
Round object with white lights all around it.
Four dull red lights above the house, travelling fast and low.
One object seen over Retford Town Hall.
Flashing green lights 1000-5000ft up in the sky.
Lights in the night sky flying in formation.
Object appeared to be a soundless pair of lights, one yellow, the other white. No discernable shape.
Four lights, one brighter than the others, sometimes fading.
White object with vivid flashing green, blue and red lights.
One object with a very bright light like an aircraft's landing light, with a smaller dimmer light on top of the bright light.
Three silver or white balls in the sky, joined by another two. Quite large. Travelling in a line.
One bright white object, hovering at first, then moving quickly.
Changing shape. Strong blue, green and red lights pulsating lights. Jumbo Jet sized.
Looked like a satellite re-entering, moving across the sky, then shot off like a shooting star.
Two aircraft type objects flying next to each other. Both had vapour trails.
Lights, that were formed in a worm shape, wriggling around in the sky.
Oblong in shape with three vertical flashing lights, red, yellow and green, all flashing at the same time.
Distant object moving from side to side. Bright light, brighter than any star. Went dim from time to time.
A glowing white light that was flashing.
Green, circular object, that was hovering in its position.
White and red flashing lights, looked like they were zig-zagging, then they came to a stop. Hovered, then moved away.
One spherically shaped object, that was white and very bright. The object moved at speed in a straight line, then disappeared.
Eight to nine lights that looked like they were close and then they separated. Not too bright. Were like large fireworks.
Four small bright, white lights that looked like headlamps.
Three triangle shaped object. Looked like the Mitsubishi car sign. Middle triangle was brighter than the other two.
One globe with attachment that was white and very bright.
Twenty silver balls with an orange tinge were seen flying West of Enfield Wash.
White lights.
White object with vivid flashing green, blue and red lights.
One object with a very bright light like an aircraft's landing light, with a smaller dimmer light on top of the bright light.

Four lights, one brighter than the others, sometimes fading.
Two bright lights, really round, and orange in colour.
The object was like a big silver ball/light that was seen in the sky and it then moved off at speed to the North East. Seen night time.
A bright light was seen heading towards the earth through the clouds.
Just said it was a flying saucer.
Lights seen in the sky.
Beam of light seen.
Beam of light seen.
There were eighteen lights moving across the sky.
Looked like an orange ball of light, like a big star in the sky and it had spiderish legs.
Light bulbs in the sky. (From the Scarborough Evening Post).
An object was moving across the sky and looked like it was on fire. It was cigar shaped and silver in colour.
A light was seen travelling rapidly due South West.
Four lights in the sky, a bit like fluorescent light strips, with a yellow tinge and very bright, were floating and then disappeared.
A light was seen that was a flashing ball, changing colour from red, orange, green and blue. Was hovering for about 30 minutes.
Two bright lights, which were then joined by a third bright light, which then flew along side them.
A UFO, Shooting Star or something was seen, couldn't really make out what it was! Was bright blue/white in colour.
A blue ball of light, with a tail at the end.
Very bright lights were seen for over half an hour. They were hovering quite slowly from side to side.
Two objects were seen in the sky.
A disc was seen flying above two aircraft.
Objects were seen in the sky towards the moon.
A UFO.
Ball of light that faded away, then came back again. Orange ball was near the car.
Twelve - fifteen orange balls of light seen moving across the sky. Moved upwards, then faded away.
An object was moving across the sky and looked like it was on fire. It was cigar shaped and silver in colour.
